channel.title: Wow this has to suck. (Dystonia Dissorder)
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mScGC7nFDxM&feature=popular
This girl got an annual flu shot and 10 days later she had Dystonia. Dystonia is a neurological disorder that effects your movement with incredible spasms and other inconvenient body movements. She was going to be a professional cheerleader, and now because of a flu shot she's fucked over for the rest of her life unless there's some way to sustain the spasms.
Oh, and the weird thing about it all is that she walks backwards to fix it the spasms. Just watch, you'll understand.
